headline: New Jersey's Merrill Creek Reservoir Earns Governor's Environmental Excellence Award
summary: The Merrill Creek Reservoir (MCR), a 2,700-acre water supply and environmental preserve part-owned by FirstEnergy's Jersey Central Power & Light electric company and FirstEnergy Pennsylvania (FEPA), which does business in the eastern part of Pennsylvania as Met-Ed, has been recognized as a 2024 Governor's Environmental Excellence Award winner by the New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection (DEP).
